items.title: Take My Indian Aluminum Spoons. Please!
items.abstract: For a not-quite-retrospective, the designer Paola Navone is giving away pieces of her creative life.

items.title: In T’s Spring Design Issue, Three Maximalist Homes Filled With Collections
items.abstract: It’s the objects in each of these spaces — as well as those in her own, T’s editor in chief writes — that bring the place to life.

items.title: In Mexico City, a Private Art Collection Evolves into a Public Museum
items.abstract: One of the world’s richest men says he hopes his extensive collection can be a gift to his country long after he is gone.

items.title: Lacroix to Design Special Collection for Schiaparelli
items.abstract: While the search for a creative director at Schiaparelli isn’t exactly over, the Paris house had something fabulous to announce today: Christian Lacroix will design a special collection for the label.

items.title: By Design | Sourcing Ralph Lauren’s Home Collection
items.abstract: Ralph Lauren Home celebrates its 30th anniversary and the craft traditions of the Old World companies that produce its collections.
